name: Doors!
description:
A loan of mugaitons have attacked the earth, Your player John has to pick up fruits to the sister Maggie, Make sure you pick up the fruit to go into the top and avoid mugaitons, There are five levels in this game, when you beat it all levels your the star of the game, you have three lives and when points up to 5000 you earn a life and there are powerups, Now go save Maggie!

Created by Brian Kirsch

2019 ©ARvision
